com.innerspec.main

Class ThicknessManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.innerspec.main.ThicknessManager

  • public class ThicknessManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the main methods for handling thicknesses for files. This is used to contain the list of thicknesses as well as to generate the thickness header for each Gerber file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> thicknessArrayOutput
      Contains the list of thicknesses in their string format for gbr files.
      private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> thicknesses
      Contains the list of the numeric thicknesses in the dxf/gbr files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThicknessManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addThickness(double thickness)
      Adds a thickness to the list of thicknesses and the Gerber output list.
      static java.lang.String getThicknessArrayOutput()
      Uses thicknessArrayOutput to create a list of thicknesses separated into lines for output to Gerber file headers.
      static int getThicknessCode(double thickness)
      Returns the thickness code (starting with 10) for a thickness in the thicknesses array.
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getThicknesses() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addThickness

        public static void addThickness(double thickness)
        Adds a thickness to the list of thicknesses and the Gerber output list.
        Parameters:
        thickness - The decimal form of the desired thickness

      • getThicknessArrayOutput

        public static java.lang.String getThicknessArrayOutput()
        Uses thicknessArrayOutput to create a list of thicknesses separated into lines for output to Gerber file headers.
        Returns:
        output Thickness code header

      • getThicknessCode

        public static int getThicknessCode(double thickness)
        Returns the thickness code (starting with 10) for a thickness in the thicknesses array. Used by the entity classes (line, arc, and circle) to output the tool or thickness that should be used. Returns 0 if thickness does not exist.
        Parameters:
        thickness - Thickness of the desired code.
        Returns:
        Thickness code of the parameter.

      • getThicknesses

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getThicknesses()
